metadata.name: METAKAMI Manga Chapter 1
metadata.description:
The METAKAMI Manga is the result of METAKAMI NFT Holders expressing their voting power to drive the creative direction of the Manga. As the next chapter's token is released, your previous token can be burnt and exchanged for 100% of the royalties made from secondary volume traded.

To participate in this decentralized storytelling movement, visit: https://metakami.io/

Grab your METAKAMI: https://opensea.io/collection/metakami-enter-the-void
